idea:
“Morya Tours”, who always thought to plan your holidays with varied travel options for all kinds of discerning travelers. The widely celebrated tour operator started its journey in the year 2007 with the objective to provide the best of services to its customers. 

We are committed to deliver what we mention “Add life in Days” to our customers. We believe that group tours enable us to explore humanity, unity and new relations with full of joy and varieties it gives us the spirit and adds memories in our life. 

The year of new foundations and the year of new beginnings! With the idea to create a world of affordable tourism and to explore as well as innovate new avenues in the travel industry, we set out on a journey to achieve “Mumbai ka Travel King” a feat we are strongly working towards everyday. 

Today, the company boasts of 100 professionals delivering travel services through the various partners across globe from the famous escorted tours, eco-tourism, exciting specialty tours and customized tailor-made holidays to the engaging cost saver tours and the very well planned venue, tours, conference tours for vendor, clients, employees and corporate tours, Morya Tours has an array of options on its platter. 

We respect humanity. We participate in various social activities and donation programs because we think that we should have responsibilities towards betterment of our society and needy people who need our hand to raise them up to some extent.
name: MORYA TOURS AND TRAVELS LLP

name: CLONE FUTURA EDUCATION PRIVATE LIMITED

idea: Dream Engine Studio LLP, an Animation Studio/Company based in Mumbai with it's tagline as "Our Engines. for Your Dreams" which simply says that our resources would collaboratively work for your Dreams. This Dream can be anything, grabbing a Dream project, creating your Company's first online presence, explaining your manufacturing process to the masses, etc etc. Basically everyone needs a business animation, the only thing is they do not know whom to get in touch with.
name: DREAM ENGINE STUDIO LLP

idea: Automation based start-up which had developed the world's first Electric Self-driving tractor. The company has developed other interesting products such Electric Smart Tricycle and Smart Toilets.
